mapper.insert: insert into tab_game( createTime, destroyTime, version, isValid, gmName, gmVersion, gmPublisherId, gmTypeId, gmIcon, gmMark, gmPlatformIsAndroid, gmAndroidUrl, gmPlatformIsIOS, gmIOSUrl, gmOperatorId, gmRunenv, gmDetail, gmIntroMedia, gmFree, gmPrice, gmTag, gmPubdate ) values( #{createTime}, #{destroyTime}, #{version}, #{isValid}, #{gmName}, #{gmVersion}, #{gmPublisherId}, #{gmTypeId}, #{gmIcon}, #{gmMark}, #{gmPlatformIsAndroid}, #{gmAndroidUrl}, #{gmPlatformIsIOS}, #{gmIOSUrl}, #{gmOperatorId}, #{gmRunenv}, #{gmDetail}, #{gmIntroMedia}, #{gmFree}, #{gmPrice}, #{gmTag}, #{gmPubdate} );
mapper.select: select g.*,t.id as gmTypeId,t.gmTypeEnName as gmTypeName,p.id as gmPublisherId,p.gmPublisherName as gmPublisherName ,o.id as gmOperatorId,o.gmOperatorName as gmOperatorName from tab_game g left join tab_type t on g.gmTypeId = t.id left join tab_publisher p on g.gmPublisherId = p.id left join tab_operator o on g.gmOperatorId = o.id where g.id = #{id};
